predicate.note: Frames file for 'stroll' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to walk at a leisurely pace

example.name: transitive
example.text: They 're hiring models [0] [*T*-1] to stroll the aisles [*-2] sporting their jewels , and they 're even beginning [*-4] to borrow a perennial favorite of the beauty business -- [*] offering a gift when consumers make a purchase [*T*-3] .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: While she applauds the fact that more Americans are getting up from the television [*-2] to stroll or garden , she says [0] the percentage of Americans who [*T*-1] do `` real exercise [0] [*T*-3] to build the heart '' is only 10 % to 20 % [*U*] .
